title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted dark green silk ornamented with cut steel beads in lengthwise pattern of diamond bars.  Two steel rings control side closing; at either end are tassels of steel beads and drops.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.Medium: silk, metal
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-76.
